name: Caso Álvarez: Los comienzos
description:
IMPORTANT: THE GAME IS A PUBLIC DEMO.

Hi everyone, I'm Fran, and I'm behind this game. The idea different, but as we don't have too much about programming, we decided to make the other side of the story playable as an rpg maker game.

I will explain a part of the story.

The game is situated in 1989, in Buenos Aires, Argentina. You are an investigator, and you are investigating a rare crime, but you got kidnapped.

This is a demo from the point of view of a killed investigator. So, we made this game as demo. The full game is based on an investigator from another country, send to Buenos Aires, to investigate the case of the guy of the demo.

Actually, the idea is to find people who know how to code and some other things, or money to contact coders. 

If needed, we will translate the game to english (for the moment it is in spanish).
